meta.title: Telelife Guide - first 20 pages
meta.description: Full branching JSON for first 20 pages. Simple numeric IDs (Q1, Q2...).
meta.notes: Agent should call get_question(questionId) to fetch nodes. Each node contains type/next/meta.

Q11.text: Net Worth (ask only if $1,000,000+ applied or age 60+)

Q25.text: Other Insurance - Policy # / Policy Type (first if multiple)

Q28.text: Is this replacing an existing policy? (Yes/No)

Q28a.text: If yes, provide details of replaced policy (policy #, company, reason)

Q38.text: PLICO SUPP OLI - For any policy to be issued will any portion of initial or future premiums be borrowed, loaned or financed? (Yes/No)

Q38_stop.text: If Yes: Stop TeleInterview. Agent must submit a traditional paper application to the Home Office. (SYSTEM STOP)

Q39.text: Is there any intention any party other than Owner(s) will obtain any right, title or interest in any policy as a result of this application? (Yes/No)

Q39a.text: If Yes: please describe the party and the nature of interest

Q40.text: Is a trust to be an Owner of any policy issued as a result of this application? (Yes/No)

Q40a.text: If Yes: provide trust name, trustee and trustee contact info

Q41.text: Have you ever had, been told you had, or been treated for: AIDS (Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome)? (Yes/No)

Q41_stop.text: If Yes: Must discontinue the application process. (SYSTEM STOP)

Q42.text: Drug Use - Have you ever used amphetamines, marijuana, cocaine, hallucinogens, heroin or other drugs except as prescribed by a physician? (Yes/No)

Q43.text: Have you used any mind or mood altering drugs in the last 10 years? (Yes/No)

Q44.text: Do you presently use mind or mood altering drugs? (Yes/No)

Q45.text: If no usage in last 10 years: When did you last use any drug? (date or year)

Q46.text: What is the name or type of drug(s) you currently use?

Q47.text: What type of drugs have you used? (Marijuana / Other - specify)

Q48_marijuana.text: If Marijuana: How often do you use this drug? (text)

Q48_other.text: If Other: specify drug type and year last used

Q49.text: How much of the drug is being used? (amount/frequency)

Q50.text: What year did you last use marijuana? (if applicable)

Q51.text: Did you ever use substantially more than you use currently? (Yes/No)

Q52.text: If Yes: When did you use the drug(s) more than currently? (From date - To date)

Q53.text: What was the name or type of drug(s) used previously?

Q54.text: How often did you use this drug (previous use)?

Q55.text: Urinary/Reproductive - Have you ever had, been told you had, or been treated for: Sugar, protein or blood in urine; venereal disease, stone or other disorder of kidney, bladder, prostate, reproductive organs or breasts (not including cancer)? (Yes/No)

Q56.text: Which of the following have you had, been treated for, or been diagnosed with? (Kidney Disorder / Kidney Stones / Bladder/Prostate/Reproductive/ Breasts / Sugar/Protein/Blood in Urine / Venereal Disease / Other)

Q57_kidney_disorder.text: Kidney Disorder - What was the specific condition?

Q58_kidney_disorder_when.text: When did the condition first occur?

Q60_kidney_tests.text: Were any special tests performed? (For example: biopsy) (Yes/No)

Q61_kidney_tests_type.text: If Yes: What types of tests were performed?

Q62_kidney_results.text: What were the results? (Was it benign?)

Q63_kidney_treatment.text: Did you receive any treatment, hospitalization or medication? (Yes/No)

Q64_kidney_treatment_details.text: If Yes: Which treatment/hospitalization/medication? provide details

Q66_kidney_physician.text: Is/was this treated by your personal physician? (Yes/No)

Q67_kidney_doctor_info.text: Doctor name / address / phone that has records for this condition

Q68_kidney_followup.text: When was your last follow-up for this condition and what were the results?

Q69_kidney_recurrence.text: Has there been any recurrence or current treatment? (Yes/No)

Q69a_kidney_recurrence_details.text: If Yes: Provide details of recurrence/current treatment

Q70.text: Digestive/Liver - Have you had Hepatitis or Gallbladder, IBS, Ulcer, Diverticulitis, Chronic Diarrhea, Appendicitis or Pancreatitis, Jaundice or other? (Yes/No)

Q71_digestive_list.text: Which of the following? (Hepatitis / Gall Bladder / IBS / Ulcer / Diverticulitis / Chronic Diarrhea / Appendicitis / Pancreatitis / Jaundice / Other)

Q72_hepatitis_type.text: What type of Hepatitis were you diagnosed with?

Q73_hepatitis_diagnosis_date.text: When were you diagnosed as having Hepatitis?

Q74_hepatitis_treatment.text: Have you been given treatment for this condition? (Yes/No)

Q75_hepatitis_treatment_type.text: If Yes: What type of treatment were you given?

Q76_hepatitis_currentstatus.text: When did you last receive treatment? (date)

Q78_hepatitis_treatment_details.text: If Yes: How are you being treated? (text)

Q79_hepatitis_physician.text: Name/address/phone of doctor or medical facility that has records for this condition

Q80.text: Gall Bladder / Appendicitis / Other digestive - ask specific follow-ups (diagnosis, surgery, dates, recovered) - (Yes/No follow-ups included)

Q90.text: Respiratory - Have you ever had, been told you had, or been treated for respiratory conditions? (Yes/No)

Q91_respiratory_list.text: Which respiratory condition? (Asthma / COPD / Sleep Apnea / Tuberculosis / Other)

Q92_asthma_details.text: What is the specific medical condition (asthma details)?

Q93_asthma_treatment.text: Did you receive medication or treatment? (Yes/No)

Q94_asthma_med_details.text: If Yes: name of medication or type of treatment

Q95_asthma_start_date.text: When did you start on this medication or treatment?

Q96_asthma_physician.text: Name, address and phone number of the doctor or medical facility that has records for this condition

Q97_asthma_last_followup.text: When was your last follow-up for this condition and what were the results?

Q98_asthma_recurrence.text: Has there been a recurrence or are you currently being treated? (Yes/No)

Q98a_asthma_recurrence_details.text: If Yes: Provide details of recurrence

Q99_end_respiratory.text: Respiratory section complete. Move to next section.

Q100_sleep_apnea_start.text: Sleep Apnea - Was a sleep study performed? (Yes/No)

Q101_sleep_study_date.text: If Yes: When did you have the sleep study? (date)

Q102_sleep_no_study.text: If No: Was a CPAP or BiPAP prescribed? (Yes/No)

Q103_sleep_results.text: What were the results of the sleep study?

Q104_cpap_usage.text: Was a CPAP or BiPAP machine prescribed? (Yes/No)

Q104a_still_using_machine.text: If Yes: Are you still using the machine on a regular basis? (Yes/No)

Q105_sleep_surgery.text: Was surgery performed for sleep apnea? (Yes/No)

Q105a_sleep_surgery_date.text: If Yes: When was the surgery performed? (date)

Q106_sleep_followup.text: Was a sleep study done after your treatment? (Yes/No)

Q107_post_treatment_study_results.text: If Yes: What were the results of the sleep study after treatment?

Q108_sleep_symptoms.text: Do you have any ongoing symptoms? (Yes/No)

Q109_sleep_symptoms_details.text: If Yes: Please provide details of ongoing symptoms

Q110.text: Mental / Nervous - Have you ever had convulsions, seizures, epilepsy, paralysis, mental or nervous disorder, anxiety or depression? (Yes/No)

Q111_mental_list.text: Which of the following? (Seizures / Mental or Nervous Condition / Any other including Paralysis)
choices: Mental or Nervous Condition (Anxiety or Depression)

Q112_seizures_details.text: Seizures/Convulsions/Epilepsy - What is the specific medical condition?

Q113_seizures_current_treatment.text: Are you currently being treated for this condition? (Yes/No)

Q114_seizures_treatment_type.text: If Yes: What is the current type of treatment? (Medication / Other)

Q115_seizures_med_name.text: If Medication: What is the name of the medication?

Q115_seizures_other_details.text: If Other: Please provide details regarding the management or treatment

Q116_seizures_history.text: Have you ever received treatment or surgery for this condition? (Yes/No)

Q117_seizures_treatment_history.text: If Yes: Provide treatment history details

Q118_seizures_last_episode.text: When was your last episode? Provide date.

Q119_seizures_physician.text: Provide name/address/phone of physician or medical facility that has records

Q120_mental_details.text: Mental/Nervous - describe the diagnosis or condition (Anxiety/Depression) and when first occurred

Q121_mental_treatment.text: Did you receive medication or treatment? (Yes/No)

Q123_mental_physician.text: Name/address/phone of doctor or facility with records

Q124_mental_followup.text: When was your last follow-up for this condition and what were the results?

Q125_mental_recurring.text: Has there been any residual or lasting effect? (Yes/No)

Q125a_mental_residual_details.text: If Yes: Please provide details of residual effects

Q126_general_health.text: General Health - other than previously stated, have you within the past 5 years had a checkup, consultation, illness, injury or surgery? (Yes/No)

Q127_general_reason.text: If Yes: For what reason did you consult a doctor? (Checkup/OB-GYN/Pregnancy/Cold/Backache/Other - describe)

Q128_general_visit_date.text: What was the date of the visit? (date or select Less than 1 year/Over 1 year)

Q129_general_results.text: What were the results of the visit?

Q130_general_physician.text: Was this visit with your personal physician? (Yes/No)

Q132_obgyn_section.text: OB/GYN - What was the date of OB/GYN check-up? (if applicable)

Q133_obgyn_results.text: What were the results of the OB/GYN check-up?

Q134_blood_children_section.text: Children - Blood: Have any of the children been treated or diagnosed with diabetes, recurrent infections, enlarged lymph glands, anemia, or other blood disorders? (Yes/No)

Q135_children_blood_details.text: If Yes: Child's name, specific diagnosis, date of diagnosis, physician/hospital, date of last visit

Q136_children_bonejoint.text: Children - Bone/Joint: Have any of the children been treated or diagnosed with arthritis, disorders of muscles, skin or bones? (Yes/No)

Q137_children_bone_details.text: If Yes: Child's name, diagnosis, medication prescribed, date of diagnosis, attending physician/hospital, date of last visit

Q138_children_meds.text: Children - Meds: Have any of the children ever been on or advised to be on any medication or prescribed diet? (Yes/No)

Q139_children_meds_details.text: If Yes: Child's name, diagnosis, medication/diet, date of diagnosis, attending physician/hospital, date of last visit

Q140.text: End of first 20-page questionnaire section summary: proceed to confirm or save answers. (END/PROCEED)
